S04n412:2: kiyatā bhadanta bhagavan samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ?

S04n412:213: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena prāmodyaprasādena viṃśativarṣasadṛśaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃvṛtto,
S04n412:215: sa ca kulaputra rājāmṛtaśuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇāśītibhiśca koṭṭarājasahasrairanyaiśca dvānavatibhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ śīlaśrutasamādhisauratyairabhiyogakṛtavān |
S04n412:216: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nupūrveṇa caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrāvakayānakathāṃ paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca;
S04n412:218: tataḥ śatasahasramanuttaramahāyānakathāyāṃ tathā kāyasmṛtyupasthānakathāyāmuddiṣṭavān paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca,
S04n412:230: yāvadapareṇa kālasamayena ratnagarbhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |

S04n412:237: sa teṣāṃ saptānāṃ divasānāmatyayena caturaśītibhiḥ prāṇasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāni vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayāgārādanāgarikāṃ pravrajya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavān;

S04n412:241: upāsakasaṃvare ca śrāmaṇerasaṃvare upasaṃpadāyāṃ bhikṣubhāve brahmacaryavāsasaṃvare niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |

S04n412:272: “ye kecid yācanakā annārthikā yāvad ratnārthikā vā te sarva āgacchantu |

S04n412:293: “śṛṇvantu me iha devayakṣamaharddhikā ye kecinnarā ye'surā ye ca bhūtā ihāgatāḥ khecarā bhūmau sthitā ye narā,

S04n412:311: so'haṃ praṇidhānavaśena tataścyavitvā saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetra upapannaścaṇḍālakule dvitīyaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca |

S04n412:348: na kenacit pūrvaṃ bodhisattvenaivaṃrūpaḥ dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,
S04n412:349: na ca punaḥ kaścidbodhisattvo bhaviṣyati ya evaṃrūpaṃ dānaparityāgaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ parityajati,
S04n412:350: yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaṃ parityaktaṃ,
S04n412:353: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sarvaghoṣāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃkaramardārcirnāma tathāgato varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n412:357: varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtavān gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā kalpātikrāntāḥ |
S04n412:359: adyāpi tasya mahākāruṇikasya śarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakāryaṃ kurvanti |
S04n412:360: evaṃ ca vadanti sārakusumito bodhisattvo dṛḍhavīryasamādhāno balavegaparityāgena bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati |
S04n412:361: daśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamairmahākalpairatikrāntaiḥ paścāt sa tatrottarāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sahetusaṃkarṣaṇo nāma bhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre tatrāsau satpuruṣo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyati,
S04n412:362: sahetukṛṣṇavidhvaṃsanarājo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān |
S04n412:363: prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭo nāma bodhisattvaḥ satpuruṣa ekasya mahākalpasyātyayena paścimāyāṃ diśi bhairavatī nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04n412:364: sūryagarbhārcivimalendro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān |
S04n412:365: ayaṃ punaḥ saṃrocano gaṇanātikrāntaiḥ kalpairnirdiṣṭitairuparimasyāṃ diśi kṣāravarcanikuñjitāyāṃ lokadhātau pañcakaṣāye tīvrakaluṣasaṃkṣobhaṇe kalpe'sau saṃrocanaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena pañcāśadvarṣāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ tatra kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04n412:366: acintyarocano nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati yāvad buddho bhagavān |
S04n412:367: sa pūrvapraṇidhānena daśavarṣāni sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati |
S04n412:370: tataḥ paścādasau prahasitabāhurbodhisattvastatra ca kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04n412:372: so'pi daśavarṣāṇi sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati |
S04n412:373: tasya ca parinirvṛtasya pūrvapraṇidhānena saptavarṣāṇi saddharmaḥ sthāsyati |
S04n412:374: atra dvau satpuruṣau labdhapūrvavyākaraṇau labdhāsvādāvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhagavataḥ purataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prītisaumanasyaprāmodyena saptatālamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe'bhyudgamya prāñjalībhūtau sthitvā bhagavantamekasvareṇa gāthābhiradhyabhāṣatāṃ |
S04n412:397: te catvāro dharaṇidatto vīryasaṃcodanaḥ sārakusumitaḥ prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭaḥ,
S04n412:398: ime ṣaṭsatpuruṣā mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāstāṃ śṛṇu |
S04n412:400: yadāsīttena kālena tena samayenedaṃ buddhakṣetramarajamerujugupsitaṃ nāmābhut,
S04n412:401: tadāhaṃ mahākalpe vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne'haṃ ca kulaputra tena kālena durdhano nāma babhūva balacakravartī jambūdvīpavijayī sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ babhūva |
S04n412:403: te'pyapareṇa samayena niṣkramya gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane pravrajitāste ca bhūyasyā mātrayā gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavantaḥ,
S04n412:404: sthāpayitvā ṣaṭputrāṃ ye na pravrajitā na cecchanti bodhicittamutpādayituṃ |
S04n412:411: , yaḥ kṣayāntakāle saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne pravrajito'śaktaḥ sakalaṃ śīlaskandhamārādhayituṃ,
S04n412:420: ta āhur[“]yadyasmākaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ dadyādevaṃ vayaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayemaḥ“ |
S04n412:421: tadahaṃ kulaputra śrutvā paramaprītamanā evaṃ cintayāmi |
S04n412:423: āryāṣṭāṅge upoṣadhavāse samādāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu samādāpitā |
S04n412:424: yannūnamahamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ dadyāṃ;
S04n412:427: evaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ dattaṃ |
S04n412:428: ahaṃ ca niṣkramya pravrajitaste ca ṣajjambūdvīparājānaḥ parasparaviruddhāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigraharogaparacakrasaṃkṣobhavividamāpannāḥ |
S04n412:438: “]tato'ham āśramaṃ parityajya madhyameṣu janapadeṣu gatvā dagapālaṃ parvatamabhiruhya praṇidhānamakarot |
S04n412:459: mama ca kulaputra sa kāyaḥ sattvaiḥ paribhujyamānaḥ pratidinaṃ vardhate,
S04n412:461: sarvatra mānuṣaśirāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sakeśakarṇanayanānāsauṣṭhadāntāḥ sajihvā anekamukhaśatasahasrāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ |
S04n412:468: yasyārthaṃ yenārthaṃ yāvadarthaṃ saṃtarpitaśarīrāḥ paripurṇābhiprāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha,
S04n412:473: ye ca tatra vijñāḥ sattvāste kecicchrāvakayāne cittamutpādayanti,
S04n412:488: yāvaddaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sarvajambūdvīpakā manuṣyā yakṣamṛgapakṣiṇo'pi svaśarīreṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa |
S04n412:496: kṛtsnaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prajñāpanapramāṇaṃ me tatra svacarma parityaktaṃ |
S04n412:497: paśya kulaputra daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ svaśarīraparityāgāḥ parityaktā ekajīvitena;
S04n412:500: evaṃ ca me tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n412:504: evameva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā varṣasahasrā asminnarajamerujugupsite buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpo mamātmabhāvaḥ prādurabhavat,
S04n412:505: yathaikadvīpe daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evaṃ sarvadvīpeṣu sattvāṃ svamānsarudhiracarmanayanakarṇanāsauṣṭhajihvākeśaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu samādāpayeyaṃ,
S04n412:506: manuṣyāṃ yakṣarākṣasāṃ sarvatiryagyonikān ye kecin mānsarudhirabhojanāhārāḥ pṛthagyakṣā yāvadantaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ tāṃścāhaṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ |
S04n412:507: yathā cāhamekasmin buddhakṣetre svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ |
S04n412:508: evameva samantaddaśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu svamānsarudhiracarmanayanāṃ yāvajjihvābhirevaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān mahākalpān teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu svakāyajīvitena sattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ,
S04n412:510: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravartitadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04n412:512: mā cāhaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaramāṇo buddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ mā ca dharmaśabdaṃ mā saṅghaśabdaṃ mā pāramitāśabdaṃ mā mārabalaparāśayaśabdaṃ mā vaiśāradyaśabdaṃ yāvat kuśalaśabdamapi saṃsāre mā śṛṇuyāṃ,
S04n412:514: yadi me evaṃrūpaḥ svaśarīraparityāgaḥ sattvasaṃtarpaṇārthe na saṃpadyata,
S04n412:515: naivaṃrūpaṃ ca me praṇidhānaṃ paripūri syādyathā me āśā cintitā |
S04n412:516: ye'pi cemasmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvatra dvīpeṣvekaikasmiṃ dvīpa evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktāḥ sattvāṃśca mānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitā,
S04n412:517: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā evaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena svamānsarudhireṇa santarpitāḥ |
S04n412:518: paśya kulaputra tathāgatasya dānapāramitā ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ ya mayānuprabandhena tatkālaṃ netrāḥ parityaktāḥ teṣāṃ punarayaṃ jambūdvīpe yāvattrāyastriṃśaddevaparyantapramāṇe rāśirbhavet |
S04n412:520: punaraparaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādaprameyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena ayaṃ buddhakṣetraścandravidyuto nāma babhūva;
S04n412:522: ahaṃ cāsmiṃ jambudvīpe rājā babhūva pradīpapradyoto nāma balavāṃścakravartī |
S04n412:523: evaṃ ca mayā sarvajaṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu niyojitā,
S04n412:527: paścādbāhuṃ gāḍhabandhanaṃ badhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayāmātyāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ |
S04n412:531: yadetasya puruṣasya saṃvatsare śaṣpaṃ dhānyaṃ cotpadyate tato devasya ṣaṭkāṃśo deyaḥ,
S04n412:532: yathānye kuṭumbino dadantyāyadvāraṃ ye devasya nagaragrāmajanapadakarvaṭeṣu prativasanti karmāntena jīvikāṃ kalpayanti;
S04n412:538: yaddevasya divasedivase'nnapānabhojanaparibhogo devīnāṃ devasya cāntaḥpuradevasya putrāṇāṃ duhitṛṇāṃ upabhogaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tatparaḥ sakāśāduddhriyate |
S04n412:543: imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pañcabhāgaśatāni kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ pradattaṃ |
S04n412:544: ahaṃ ca tapovanaṃ gatvā riṣipravrajyena brahmacaryaṃ cacāra;
S04n412:545: vanakhaṇḍe uḍumbaramūle dakṣiṇasya mahāsamudrasya nātidūre navamūlaphalāhāro viharāmi dhyāyī anupūrveṇa pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
S04n412:546: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśatā jambūdvīpakānāṃ vāṇijānāṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇāstaistataḥ prabhūto ratnaskandha āsāditaḥ |
S04n412:547: tatra ca candro nāma sārthavāhaḥ tena bhāgyavatā vijñapuruṣeṇa cintāmaṇiḥ samāsāditaḥ |
S04n412:548: sa tato ratnadvīpādvipulaṃ ratnadhanaskandhaṃ taṃ ca cintāmaṇiṃ gṛhītvā saṃprasthitaḥ,
S04n412:549: tataḥ kṣubhitaḥ samudro nāgā ākulā rudanti devatā yāstatra nivāsinyastatra cāśvasto nāma riṣirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tatropapannaḥ;
S04n412:550: tena mahāsattvena sa sārthaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa ca mahāsamudrāduttāritastasya ca sārthavāhasyānyataro duṣṭarākṣasaḥ pratyarthiko'vatāraprekṣī vivaragaveṣī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ |
S04n412:552: yataste vaṇijaḥ praṇaṣṭamārgā paramabhītāduccasvareṇa krandanti rudanti paridevanti,
S04n412:554: yāvadaśroṣīdahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa yāvattatrāgatvā vaṇijaḥ samāśvāsitāḥ,
S04n412:559: tadāhaṃ paṭṭaṃ tailena mrakṣayitvā svahastaṃ veṣṭya agninā prajvālya satyavacanamakarot - “yadi mayā ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṣā caturbhirbrāhmairvihārairvanakhaṇḍanivāsināṃ sattvānāmarthāya hitāya navamūlaphalāhāreṇa caturaśītīnāṃ nāgayakṣasahasrāṇāṃ cittasantatiḥ paripācitā avaivartikāśca sthāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n412:560: tena satyena satyavacanena kuśalamūlaparipākena jvalatu me hastaṃ;
S04n412:561: labhantu mārgaṃ vaṇijaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa jambūdvīpaṃ prāpayantu“ |
S04n412:563: te vaṇijo jambūdvīpe sthāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ :
S04n412:567: sārthavāho bhaveyaṃ jambudvīpe saptavārāṃ cintāmaṇimānayitvā vividhaṃ ratnavarṣaṃ abhipravarṣayeyaṃ;
S04n412:568: yāvat sarvadvīpeṣvasmin buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu ratnaṃ pravarṣayeyaṃ,
S04n412:570: evaṃ ca me āśā paripūrṇā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ mahākalpānāmantareṇa sārthavāho'bhūvan,
S04n412:571: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ratnāni pravarṣitāni;
S04n412:573: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ratnaiḥ paripurṇābhiprāyāḥ kṛtāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitāḥ |
S04n412:576: saṃtoṣaṇe kalpe vartamāne pañcakaṣāye pañcavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ praṇidhānenāhamasmin jambūdvīpe sūryamālagandho nāma brāhmaṇo'bhūvan vedapāṭhakaḥ |
S04n412:577: tatkālaṃ ca sattvā bhūyasā śāśvatadṛṣṭayo'bhūvan savairaparākramāḥ sakalahādhiṣṭhānāḥ |
S04n412:578: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ mahābalavegaparākrameṇa sattvānāṃ śatrubhūtaṃ skandhaprayogena dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04n412:582: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā mamāvavādānuśāsanena pañcābhijñāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
S04n412:583: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kalahavigrahavairānavasṛjya vanakhaṇḍamāśṛtya vanakhaṇḍe mūlaphalāhārā dhyāyantaścaturbhirbrāhmairvihārai rātridivasamatināmitavantaḥ |
S04n412:584: tataḥ kṣīyamāṇe kalpe yadā tairdakṣiṇīyaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sphuṭamabhūt |
S04n412:592: “yannūnamahaṃ śakraṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ lokapālānanye ca devarṣayo vā nāgarṣayo vā śakrarṣayo vā manuṣyarṣayaśca sannipātayeyaṃ,
S04n412:594: tadāhamṛddhyā gatvā śakrabrahmāṇalokapāladevarṣīṇāṃ nāgarṣīṇāṃ śakrarṣīṇāṃ manuṣyarṣīṇāṃ ārocayeyaṃ |
S04n412:596: tatra saṃnipātayitvā viḍacarakamūrdhani nāma sthānaṃ bhūtasaṃnivāraṇapratiśaraṇaṃ rakṣāvātapittaśleṣmasaṃprasādanaśāstraṃ nirdeśayeyaṃ“ |
S04n412:598: tatra mahāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā mayaikadivase'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāvabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04n412:605: tadanena kulaputra kuśalamūlavipākena iyaṃ me praṇidhānāśā paripūrṇāḥ |
S04n412:608: glānapratyayopakaraṇārthaṃ devarṣiyakṣasaṅghāḥ sannipātitāḥ sattvānāmarthāya viḍacarakamūrdhani devaloke prakāśite sattvānāmārogyakauśalyamevameva timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu caivaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04n412:610: devanāgayakṣamanuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sannipātitā yaissattvānāmarthāya vividhā vidyāsthānāḥ prakāśitāḥ |
S04n412:611: yathena timire buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04n412:616: anuttarā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpā āśā paripūrṇāḥ |
S04n412:617: api tatra timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n412:618: apyanuttareṇa jñānena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvaikaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto,
S04n412:621: ayaṃ ca tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ sucaritānāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ |
S04n412:622: tathā pratyavarakālasamaye'saṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairadhikatarairantareṇedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vicitadoṣaṃ nāmābhūt,
S04n412:624: purimāyāṃ diśyanupañcāśāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ vaḍaṃ nāma jambūdvīpamabhūt |
S04n412:626: caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī rājā ambaro nāma babhūva |
S04n412:627: tatra ca mayā sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n412:629: tatra ca me yācanakā āgatvā vividhāni ratnāni yācanti,
S04n412:630: tadyathā hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ yāvaccendranīlamahānīlajyotīrasadakaprasādakāni yācanakānāṃ tāvatprabhūtāni ratnāni labhyante |
S04n412:636: na kevalaṃ tāttakā nirdeśayanti yāttakā devasya yācanakāḥ“ |
S04n412:638: “yadyahaṃ pañcakaṣāye loke vartamāne tīvrakleśāraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ |
S04n412:640: yadahamasmin buddhakṣetre nidhidarśako nāma nāgarājā bhaveyaṃ |
S04n412:641: sarvatra cāsmiṃ vijitaghoṣe buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu ca ekaikasmin dvīpe saptajanmāni parigṛhṇīyāṃ |
S04n412:642: ekaikasmiṃśca janmani nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi darśayeyaṃ prayaccheyaṃ ca nānāratnaparipūrṇāni:
S04n412:644: ekaikaśca nidhiyojanasahasrāṇi gatvā vistareṇa paripūrṇamapi ratnaṃ sattvānāṃ nidarśayeyaṃ prayacchayeyaṃ ca,
S04n412:646: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasmin kṣetre sarvatra dvīpe saptajanmāni pratigṛhṇīyāṃ“,
S04n412:648: yadā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaganatale devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairantarīkṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ |
S04n412:650: ṛdhiṣyati te evaṃrūpā āśā yathā te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ“ |
S04n412:651: aśroṣīn mahājanakāyaḥ rājño'mbarasya devairgaganatalagataiḥ sarvaṃdada iti nāma kṛtaṃ,
S04n412:654: yadi parityakṣyati tadā sarvaṃdada iti nāma bhaviṣyati“ |
S04n412:661: atha na dāsyati na sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati“ |
S04n412:662: tatastasyāgrataḥ tatra jyotīraso nāma māṇavako rājño'mbarasyāgrataḥ sthitvā,
S04n412:664: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ niryātayitvā,
S04n412:668: yo'yaṃ mamaitarhi sarvajambūdvīpe rājā pratiṣṭhāpito vartatvasya jambūdvīpe ājñā,
S04n412:673: roco nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau pādau yācitau,
S04n412:674: tasya mayā svayameva prasannacittena tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svapādau chitvā pradattau,
S04n412:677: tatra drāṣṭāvo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhe netre yācite,
S04n412:678: tasya ca mayā ubhe netre utpādya datte,
S04n412:681: na cireṇa saracchighoṣo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau karṇau yācitau,
S04n412:682: svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
S04n412:691: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau,
S04n412:692: svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
S04n412:694: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n412:700: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ |
S04n412:707: na ca me roṣa utpāditastena me āśā paripūryatu,
S04n412:709: ye kecit sattvā mānsāhārā rudhirapānāste māṃsaṃ bhakṣayantu rudhiraṃ pibeyantu |
S04n412:710: yāvacca me sattvā māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyū rudhiraṃ ca pibeyustāvan me praṇidhānavaśena śarīraṃ vardhatu,
S04n412:711: anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ saṃvardhatu pañcayojanasahasraṃ vistāreṇa |
S04n412:712: tatra mayā varṣasahasraṃ svamānsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā;
S04n412:713: yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n412:714: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva |
S04n412:715: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi |
S04n412:719: gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartadhvaṃ,
S04n412:723: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca |
S04n412:728: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān |
S04n412:729: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
S04n412:730: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu,
S04n412:731: ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ pradattā,
S04n412:735: yathātra pūrve na ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
S04n412:737: na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
S04n412:739: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva |
S04n412:740: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro'bhūvan savirocano nāma |
S04n412:742: dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ |
S04n412:743: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā māṃ pṛcchanti |
S04n412:751: tāṃścāhaṃ na khādayāmi ye manuṣyā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādviratā,
S04n412:753: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena vā cittānyutpādayanti tānapyahaṃ na khādayāmi“ |
S04n412:754: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ |
S04n412:757: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n412:760: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā |
S04n412:761: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04n412:764: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04n412:766: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu |
S04n412:767: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yakṣarūpeṇa mayā manuṣyāḥ kuśalamārgacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n412:768: yathā ca mayā bahavaḥ sattvā bhayāt kuśalacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
S04n412:769: tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa mamaitarhi bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇasya bodhimabhisaṃbodhukāmasya māraḥ pāpīyāṃ mahāsainyenopasaṃkrānto bodhau vyākṣepakaraṇārthaṃ |
S04n412:771: bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ;
S04n412:773: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n412:775: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakayāne samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n412:778: ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04n412:782: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā,
S04n412:784: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ || 5 ||
